Because I was bored, I've set up a Twitter account so you can find out about new uploads to textadventures.co.uk the minute they're available:

http://twitter.com/TextAdv

It just uses twitterfeed to turn the updates from the existing RSS feed into Twitter updates. I may update the website at some point to post directly, then it will be completely up-to-the-second.

If you use Google Reader or similar, don't forget you can keep up to date with the feeds:

[list]
latest uploads: http://www.textadventures.co.uk/feed.php

[/list:u]
